messages.message: @alagar C1, FRB and Paychecx do have elastic in the deployments
thanks @raghu,  there is a comms to be sent to all customers by EOD
@Varun Jain, got this ticket from SC for the log4j.  https://instabase.zendesk.com/agent/tickets/2527 .. i hope we are sending this comm by today ?  cc: @arun, @Shubhu
@alagar For first response, we should inform about the impact and that we will be sharing a fix by EOD today.

@Shubhu we will share the finalised comms with the whole TAM team later today. You can inform Mani / SC team that our team started the investigation last week itself and will share detailed update before EoD
@Hari - has the testing been completed for the older images? Thanks. @alagar
@Varun Jain Yes! We have the reports now and this vulnerability is not a problem in older images either.. cc: @Yash Aggarwal

Fantastic to hear that! Thanks for the update @Hari

@Heymian can you please confirm if this is the case for table service as well?

We want to verify this completely before sharing an update with the customers.
cc/ @alagar @Theo Jungeblut
I see that @sudeep has viewed this document, i hope we can consider that as review :wink: . cc: @Varun Jain
hey no not yet - limited availability today with the ibhack+offsite. i made some edits earlier. taking another pass now
Made updates to the vulnerability communication doc, please take a look. I am okay to ship :thumbsup:

are we using _any_ version of log4j (not just the vulnerable one) in any components other than elasticsearch?

this is for https://instabase.zendesk.com/agent/tickets/2529 . shall i just tell them to wait for official comms later today?

afaik and have looked into the current master: _no_ 
@Hari @Heymian pls feel free to chime in
Hey all - any update on the comms out to customers?
trying to catch up, what do I need to chime in on? Security scans have shown that table service and pdf-service doesn’t have the vulnerability, and we do not directly use log4j.
Hi @Heymian, with that confirmation we have all we need to send out the communication to our customers. Thank you!
@Theo Jungeblut how will we be handling the comms out?  Should I be emailing CapOne with the assessment and fix?  Or are we going to open tickets?
@Gilbert Solorzano ^
It is end of day ET, where can we find the customer advisory message so our respective TAMs can send out?
@Karina the template has been shared, we just need additional confirmation from Heymian before using it
I think Heymian has also confirmed. Imo we can go ahead and send communications  out @Varun Jain @Theo Jungeblut @Gilbert Solorzano

Hi all here, it seems there has been some confusion here to the communications. I reached out on the PRE-TAM channel 4 hours ago with the instruction to reach out to all customers and the link to the security advisory.

I also had 2 hours ago a sync on the subject with @Gilbert Solorzano,
And we are tracking on that channel the notifications already provided.

This channel is the wrong place to synchronize the communication effort on the CS side,

I would recommend, that we next time start an incident in Blameless for such issue as this allows us to bring all people specific to the issue in that channel.

agreed! been quite confused by all the pings on so many different places. look like answers/confirmation were provided on a bunch of them a while ago, so it’s unclear what’s blocking. A single place would be ideal!
